title: Award-Winning Cook Islands Adults-Only Beachfront Resort with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Transfers
description:
Nestled along the tranquil shores of Rarotongaâ€™s Muri Lagoon, this adults-only Cook Islands retreat offers an idyllic escape where pristine waters and tropical serenity create the perfect setting for relaxation and adventure. 

With just 30 exclusive rooms crafted in a style inspired by Polynesian elegance, it provides a truly intimate island experience.

Enjoy South Pacific cuisine in the shade of a poolside cabana at Silversands, and sip on refreshing cocktails from the Lagoon Lounge & Bar. To unwind completely, treat yourself to a spa session with soothing coconut oil treatments and natural cane sugar body scrubs.

Muri Lagoon is ideal for safe snorkelling and swimming, while kayaking, kite surfing and sailing present endless opportunities for exploration.
